item.title: Badges
item.description: InfluxDB University Badges InfluxDB University helps today’s developers gain the skills to make the most of time series data. The courses offered, provide learners with hands-on live and self-paced courses on a variety of topics related to InfluxDB, querying, data analysis, and best practices for working with real-time data. Learn more at influxdbu.com. Reseller Patner Badge Reseller Partner Purple Gradient InfluxDB Partners Badges Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus.

item.title: Code Typeface
item.description: Font used for code blocks Roboto Mono is a monospaced addition to the Roboto type family. Like the other members of the Roboto family, the fonts are optimized for readability on screens across a wide variety of devices and reading environments. While the monospaced version is related to its variable width cousin, it doesn’t hesitate to change forms to better fit the constraints of a monospaced environment. For example, narrow glyphs like ‘I’, ‘l’ and ‘i’ have added serifs for more even texture while wider glyphs are adjusted for weight.

item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Typography Proxima Nova is safe to use for both print and web. All design assets should be created using this font. Headlines and Body Text https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/proxima-nova Designed by: Mark Simonson and first released through FontHaus in 1994. Fun fact: Proxima Nova was originally named Zanzibar. Proxima Nova Characters abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ‘ ? ’ “ ! ” ( % ) [ # ] { @ } / & \ < - + ÷ × = > ® © $ € £ ¥ ¢ : ; , .
